message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a unique chance to acquire a product that holds significant value for you at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.
